title: Mini-Ep 151: Doree's Hotel
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 151: Doree's Hotel
itunes:subtitle: Anxiety, nerves, stress — you get it. (And we've all got it.) Kate and Doree take a break in this very special mini-episode, and invite you to join them as they journey to the relaxing and nurturing world of Doree’s Hotel. First, they visit New Yo...
description:
Anxiety, nerves, stress — you get it. (And we've all got it.) Kate and Doree take a break in this very special mini-episode, and invite you to join them as they journey to the relaxing and nurturing world of Doree’s Hotel. First, they visit New York City for a magical, holiday-inspired trip, and then they cross the Atlantic to a quaint seaside village complete with cozy book nooks and roaring fires.


Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

 

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.

IROBOT - Check out the Roomba i7+ Robot Vacuum and learn more at irobot.com/forever35. 

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.

BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends. 

RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35 . 

THUMA - Listeners can use the code FOREVER to receive a twenty-five dollar credit towards your purchase of The Bed plus free shipping at Thuma.co/forever.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
